00064 class Matrix{

00098         int cols() const {return mCols;}

00106                                       const Matrix &m, int startMRow, int startMCol);
00108         void copySubMatrix(int startRow, int startCol, const Matrix &m){
00109                 copySubBlock(startRow, startCol, m.rows(), m.cols(), m, 0, 0);}
00111         void copyMatrix(const Matrix &m){copySubMatrix(0, 0, m);}
00112 
00113         friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &os, const Matrix &m);
00114         void print(FILE *fp = stderr) const;

00210 double&
00211 Matrix::elem(int m, int n) 
00212 {
00213         assert(m<mRows);
00214         assert(n<mCols);
00215         return mData[n*mRows + m];
00216 }
00217 
00218 const double&
00219 Matrix::elem(int m, int n) const
00220 {
00221         assert(m<mRows);
00222         assert(n<mCols);
00223         return mData[n*mRows + m];
00224 }
